attributes.action: give more money to the Armed Forces so that troops are better equipped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Troops out in Afghanistan do not have sufficient equipment to do their jobs effective and its obvious the government haven't funded the troops properly. If the troops had more funding to firstly equip all soldiers properly, then fund the troops to have better quality equipment.

If they had sufficient equipment, soldiers could win the war in Afghanistan quicker.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
